titleStmt.title: The triumphs of grace: or, The last words and edifying death of the Lady Margaret de la Musse a noble French lady, who died in May 1681. Aged but sixteen years. Englished by P. L.
titleStmt.author: La Musse, Margaret de, Lady, 1664 or 5-1681.
P. L.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Lawrence, at the Angel in the Poultrey, over against the Compter,

notesStmt.note: With initial imprimatur leaf dated: Feb. I. 1686.
Running title reads: The last words of the Lady Margaret de la Musse.
Caption title on p. 109 reads: Here follows the prayer taken out of Mons. Drelincourt's comforts against the terrours of death.
With five final pages of advertisements; additional advertisement on A12v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in the Poultrey, over against the Compter
